item.description:
Due to the bad weather predicted for Sunday,
I am changing this Meet Up for more indoor activities.
Rain is scheduled to be coming around noon.
Some parts of the state will have heavy rain later in the
Afternoon.
We are going to Plan B.

Please change your RSVP if necessary.

I am meeting my guest(s) at Barnes & Noble in Milford
Around 1:15 to 1:30.
Due to weather and traffic we should be in Wallingford
Around 2:00 or after.

Others can meet up at the Bowling Alley for Bowling.

Wish that I still had my bowling ball, it took a while to
Find one my size the last time that I was there.

We can get something to eat while we are there.

Children will be invited but it will be your job to watch out for them
So that they are not struck by the bowling balls.

Directions if you are
Take I 91
Get off on Exit 13.
Turn right at the end of the Exit.
You will see the bowling alley on your right further up the road.

Sorry about no picnic this weekend.
Do not want to chance it with multiple sources predicting heavy rain.

If the weather is nice, then we can try for a picnic at
Gillette Castle next month.
See the calendar for more details.

We can try for another picnic also later this summer or early fall.

Mike B
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at the Bowling Alley. I will probably be near the front steps.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: UZ attends Bowling In Wallingford Meet Up on June 22
